sentence:
Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of the Salem Maritime National  Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act introduced by the  gentleman from Massachusetts (Mr. Moulton).

This bill would redesignate the Salem Maritime…

…Speaker, I thank my colleagues for supporting this  legislation, especially my good friend and workout buddy from Arkansas.

I urge support for my bill, H.R. 2215, the Salem Maritime National  Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act. Salem Maritime  was established in 1938 as the Nation's first national historic site.  It has spent the ensuing…

Mr. WESTERMAN. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and pass the  bill (H.R. 2215) to redesignate the Salem Maritime National Historic  Site as the ``Salem Maritime National Historical Park'', and for other  purposes.

The Clerk read the title of the bill.
